turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling because my latest bill seems incorrect. There's a charge on there I wasn't expecting, and the total is much higher than usual.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help you look into that billing discrepancy. Could you please provide your account number or the email address associated with your service?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my email is [user_email@example.com]. The charge I'm seeing is for $110.00 on October 25th. My bill is usually only around $80. I'm really confused and honestly a bit annoyed.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing that. I'm pulling up your account now... I see the $110.00 charge you're referring to on October 25th. This charge appears to be for your standard monthly service plan. Did you perhaps add any extra features or services last month?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: No, I didn't add *anything*! In fact, I removed an extra feature back in September. Why would my standard service plan突然 jump from $80 to $110 without me changing anything or getting a notification? This feels wrong.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hmm, that is unusual. Let me cross-reference this charge with your service history... According to our system, the $110 charge corresponds to the 'Premium' plan rate. It seems your plan was updated.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Updated? I never authorized an upgrade to the Premium plan! How could my plan be 'updated' without my permission? This is unacceptable! I want that $110 charge corrected immediately. I should only be charged the $80 for my regular plan.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Unauthorized changes are not standard procedure. I am unable to see a direct request from your account for a plan change to Premium. I will escalate this immediately for an investigation into how the plan was switched and to review the charge for a potential adjustment. A specialist will contact you within 24-48 hours with an update.
